arts.sum: Monaco condemn racist abuse of defender Wilfried Singo after the collision that left PSG goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma with a facial injury.

arts.ttl: PROFILE | Exuberant, eccentric Wilfried Singo should be the defender on every club’s wishlist
arts.sum: There are plenty of eye-catching players in Monaco’s squad. There are the mavericks: Eliesse Ben Seghir and Maghnes Akliouche; then there is Aleksandr Golovin and Takumi Minamino, technically gifted and…

arts.ttl: "Marca" Report: Haller headed back to Dortmund early after failed loan stint
arts.sum: Spanish sports daily "Marca" reports that negotiations are underway to end Sebastien Haller's loan to CD Leganés early.

arts.ttl: Amad Diallo keen to ‘make history’ with Manchester United
arts.sum: The 22-year-old Ivory Coast international has scored two goals and added six assists in the league this season.

arts.ttl: Rennes nearing €20m agreement to sign Al-Nassr midfielder Seko Fofana
arts.sum: Rennes are nearing an agreement to sign Al Nassr midfielder Seko Fofana (29), according to reports from L’Equipe and Ouest-France. The Ivory Coast international would make a sensational return to…

arts.ttl: Fans spot Rasmus Hojlund raging at Amad Diallo during Wolves loss just two weeks after Man United duo had a heated argument after Europa League match
arts.sum: Goals from Matheus Cunha and Hwang Hee-chan inflicted a fifth defeat on Ruben Amorim in only his 10th game in charge of the Red Devils at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Who are the next big Sporting transfer stars? Quenda, Diomande, more
arts.sum: Sporting CP have a host of players who starred under Ruben Amorim but could now be snapped up in the January transfer window.
